abstract: In the latest edition of its “Security Intelligence Report,” Microsoft said that the security 0f its Windows operating system has significantly improved.
snippet: In the latest edition of its “Security Intelligence Report,” Microsoft said that the security 0f its Windows operating system has significantly improved.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft plans to report on Monday that the security of its Windows operating system has significantly improved, while at the same time the threat of computer viruses, frauds and other online scourges has become much more serious.

headline.main: On Security, Microsoft Reports Progress and Alarm
headline.print_headline: On Security, Microsoft Reports Progress and Alarm
